price: 8. Mpo ete (Allah) atuna bato ya bosembo тропа bosôló na bango. Mpe alengeli тропа bapagano etumbu ya makasi.
arabic: لِّيَسۡـَٔلَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدۡقِهِمۡۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
